document.full_text: the florida marlins have placed twice all-star pitcher josh johnson on the 15-day disabled list because of an inflamed right shoulder, the major league baseball (mlb) team said on saturday.
document.title: marlins pitcher johnson put on disabled list
lines_and_colors: the florida marlins have placed twice all-star pitcher josh johnson on the 15-day disabled list because of an inflamed right shoulder, the major league baseball (mlb) team said on saturday.
